abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "TaxonKey" : [ "is Chaenactis glabriuscula DC." ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Riqueza y distribución de especies vegetales en la Península de Baja California 1 records from Herbario de la Universidad de Sevilla 1 records from Institut Botanic de Barcelona (IBB, CSIC-Ajuntament de Barcelona), BC-Plantae 1 records from United States National Plant Germplasm System Collection 1 records from Botany Division, Yale Peabody Museum 1 records from Etapa final de la captura y catalogación del Herbario del Instituto de Ecología, A. C., Centro Regional del Bajío 1 records from University of South Carolina, A. C. Moore Herbarium 1 records from Pittsburg State University, Theodore M. Sperry Herbarium 1 records from Muestreos y recolectas de flora endémica y casi-endémica de matorral costero y chaparral de la zona mediterránea Baja California, México 1 records from Bernice P. Bishop Museum 1 records from University of New Mexico Herbarium 1 records from EAN - Herbário Jaime Coelho de Moraes 1 records from Olga Lakela Herbarium, University of Minnesota Duluth 1 records from ICN - Herbário do Instituto de Ciências Naturais 1 records from El banco de datos del Herbario HCIB en línea (Fase I): Implementación del Sistema Biótica 1 records from MBM - Herbário do Museu Botânico Municipal 1 records from Oskarshamn herbarium (OHN) 1 records from La familia Asteraceae en México. Fase VI 1 records from UCBG TAPIR Provider 1 records from MBM herbarium - Museu Botânico Municipal \ Curitiba - Herbário Virtual REFLORA 2 records from EURISCO, The European Genetic Resources Search Catalogue 2 records from MPM Milwaukee Public Museum Herbarium 2 records from Herbarium Senckenbergianum (FR) 2 records from IAC - Herbário do Instituto Agronômico de Campinas 2 records from University of Tennessee Vascular Herbarium 2 records from Canadian Museum of Nature Palynology Collection 2 records from CONN 2 records from Geneva Herbarium – De Candolle's Prodromus (G-DC) 3 records from Pl@ntNet automatically identified occurrences 4 records from R. L. Thiers Herbarium at San Francisco State University 14 records from University of British Columbia Herbarium (UBC) - Vascular Plant Collection 15 records from LOB - California State University, Long Beach Herbarium 15 records from Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew - Herbarium Specimens 18 records from SFV - California State University, Northridge 19 records from CDA - California Department of Food and Agriculture 19 records from PUA - Pacific Union College Hebarium 20 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Botany 22 records from SDSU - San Diego State University Herbarium 23 records from Harvard University Herbaria: All Records 26 records from Intermountain Herbarium (Vascular plants & algae) 33 records from HSC - Humboldt State University Vascular Plant Herbarium 33 records from University of Colorado Museum of Natural History Herbarium Vascular Plant Collection 34 records from Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh Herbarium (E) 35 records from Digitalización y Sistematización de las Colecciones Biológicas Nacionales del Instituto de Biología, UNAM (Plantas vasculares) 37 records from NatureServe Network Species Occurrence Data 38 records from LA - University of California, Los Angeles Herbarium 39 records from Phanerogamic Botanical Collections (S) 52 records from CHSC - CSU Chico, Chico State Herbarium - Vascular Plants 65 records from The vascular plants collection (P) at the Herbarium of the Muséum national d'Histoire Naturelle (MNHN - Paris) 83 records from DAV - UC Davis Herbarium 90 records from UCSB - University of California Santa Barbara Herbarium 105 records from OBI - Robert F.
